name: Loots In Space
description:
A game about getting from one place to the other, and looting on the way.

Use gravity to get from place to place, whilst navigating a grid of levels to reach the end.

Made in 72 hours    for KalorianJam 2020 By Aidan,   Dziek & Laura. Theme was "Loot This".

CONTROLS:

Mouse to place things. Space to launch yourself (and again to boost if you have Fuel). R to restart.

Full Credits:

Created in Unity for Kalorian Jam 2020

Programming and design by Dziek Dyes-Bolt

Art and design by Laura Dunning  (@echoesandstars)

Art, music, sound design,   game design,    and additional programming   by Aidan O’Brien (@pullthetapes)

ASSETS NOT FROM TEAM

Smoke particle texture-  https://ya-webdesign.com/imgdownload.html

Font used -  Leaner Regular
